structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases

law.catch_line: Commission Of Crime While Released On Personal Recognizance; Consecutive Sentence
law.text: If a defendant on release subject to the provisions of section fifty-eight of chapter two hundred and seventy-six, commits a crime, the sentence imposed for such a crime shall run consecutively to the earlier sentence for the crime for which he was on release.
